mapper.select: SELECT a.measurement_point_id , a.service_point_id , s.service_point_nm , a.meter_id , a.meter_serial , s.apt_no , apt.apt_nm , l.location_id , l.location_nm , a.remark , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_MEASUREMENT_POINT a INNER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (a.service_point_id = s.service_point_id) INNER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (apt.location_id = l.location_id)

SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_MEASUREMENT_POINT a INNER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (a.service_point_id = s.service_point_id) INNER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (apt.location_id = l.location_id)

SELECT a.measurement_point_id , a.service_point_id , s.service_point_nm , a.meter_id , a.meter_serial , s.apt_no , apt.apt_nm , l.location_id , l.location_nm , a.remark , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_MEASUREMENT_POINT a INNER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (a.service_point_id = s.service_point_id) INNER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (apt.location_id = l.location_id) WHERE a.measurement_point_id = #{measurementPointId}
